channel.title: Hugo on Pavan Kemparaju
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Pavan Kemparaju

item.title: Go (Hu)go
item.description: This site was built using the Hugo static site generator. https://gohugo.io/ I found the Giraffe Academy Youtube tutorial about hugo very helpful in understanding how hugo works. Link for the interested: Giraffe Academy Hugo - Static Site Generator | Tutorial The site is hosted on my github repo pavankm/pavankm.github.io I purchased the domain name from Namecheap using the github student pack.
